newsite5 2019-03-04T13:57:48+00:00

Nightly Closure of Peart Road between Rodeo Road and Kortsen Road for Sewer Cleaning

Beginning Monday, March 18, 2019, through Saturday, March 23, 2019, Peart Road between Rodeo Road and Kortsen Road will be closed nightly to all traffic between 6:00 pm - 6:00 am for routine sewer inspections [...]

newsite5 2019-03-12T09:11:56+00:00

Rancho Grande Pavement Reconstruction Project

UPDATE March 4, 2019: Paving has been completed from Avenida Fresca to the north with the exception of the fog seal. Further work on the Rancho Grande Pavement Reconstruction Project will be delayed while the [...]

newsite5 2018-12-27T14:56:24+00:00

Police Department Hiring

Are you ready for a challenging and rewarding career? We are currently looking for Lateral Police Officer candidates to fill immediate openings. Police Officer (Lateral) The salary range for Lateral Police Officers is $52,560.56 [...]

newsite5 2018-12-13T08:37:54+00:00

Carr McNatt Park Construction

Project Overview On November 5, 2018, the City Council and Mayor Craig McFarland approved $8.1 million for improvements to Carr McNatt Park. The improvements include: Replacing the football field with three multi-purpose sports [...]

newsite5 2018-11-16T08:19:30+00:00

Live ATC Infrastructure Equipment

The Live ATC Infrastructure equipment was donated by CAE-Oxford Aviation Academy. Essentially what this system provides is the ability to live stream audio of aviation radio transmissions within the various airspace frequencies surrounding Casa [...]
